messages.content: I unironically agree with everything on the left side of this.
While I agree with you for the most part, I also have cats and upholstered furniture.
I agree with the concealer part for the cut crease but that's it.
I agree with your guy. Sex can sometimes improve with the adulterous partner, because he/she feels desired and sexy again.
Honestly I agree. We should shun vegetarians regardless of the [NAME] thing. /s
The co-worker thing is generally for the best,the rest I agree.
agreed....seems that due to plot force shes starting to slip
oh no I agree that its edited, but I think she has other things going on too.. BDD at least
I agree with this, but I'm guessing it's because he works from home and can work anywhere while she can't.
Totally agree with you. Just saying that [NAME] is not a stupid person. A smart person that will be spending the rest of his life in prison
As a whole, yes, if it wasn't for Classified being the greatest thing to come to zombies since bo1, then I'd have to agree.
I agree that you need more time in the later turns. But most games it feels like people wait until it is their turn to start thinking.
i would agree with that. i still dont see a good reason not to provide daycare though.
I agree. His parents were very supportive then. When they did a cast change, they decided to make his parents jerks!
You are correct, this happens everytime to me
Agreed. There is r/clevercomebacks but this is just not even that.
I agree. There was just a big disconnect. They weren't talking specifically about masculinity but about certain situations that are toxic.
There’s tons of stories of animals taking care of kids....I believe the story! :)
Fair enough. I considered it malicious compliance because I followed the letter if the rules while purposely not following the spirit.
Yeah, considering guns by themselves aren’t an issue (like I so thoroughly explained to you), that’s a valid argument.
I always give my disclaimer when he asks for my phone number. I understand and respect my situation could be a deal breaker for some.
I fully agree. What works for one doesn't worth for another. Good luck.
As a woman, I have to say I think you aren’t wrong about this.
Eh. I think either works. But sure. Replies is probably more accurate
Ahh okay, that makes a lot of sense. But you're totally right, we've just gotta work as hard as possible.
I agree totally. Talk about fucking insanely bizarre. He's stuck in the shining
That's exactly what I thought too!!!!
I agree. This is assault. Leave the ignorant hill [NAME] alone.
100% correct. Seriously, listen to [NAME] talking points when she mentions Syria. Matches RT propaganda exactly.
I would never have believed it. Having experienced it, it is true. Completely. Different. World.
Yeah I think this is a well rounded pov. Agree.
Yeah I'd recommend it, definitely an easy watch
If you’re a solo player, then I understand...
I understand your point. But I’d still rather get some stuff stolen than lose a member of the family.
Yep i always say this. Absolutely best case scenario is a foul ball. If he puts it in play it's probably a dribbler.
Honestly the rarity is fine, I find it once every 25 games but the health needs work.
A friend calls this shadow work. I think you're right. It takes a lot of courage and persistence.
Yes! These people are allowed to vote and drive and do other things that affect our lives!
agreed 100% if's freakin ridiculous! I think YouTube pays them to influence you to pay for the You Tube subscription just to NOT see these ads!
If the fan doesn't work, then I'm fine with it.
That would be okay, I guess.
It's ok, it's just Gypsy Danger
I agree with you, I just don't believe it will happen.
correct. [NAME] was our 3rd round pick. Hand lookin like the steal of the draft
Thats....that's pretty normal...prolly somewhere in the ballpark of 280miles...If you dont have a fuel efficient car its not hard to do.
I don't doubt that, but there's a difference between doing something as a social activity and a psychoactive drugs that actually makes you feel more social.
So true! My brain always goes to these places when buying a car...
Because I am a human, and I can do whatever I want, as long as it's not against the law
True! I guess we all cheer for salt lake? Since they are directly affiliated with us.

Ahh, I see. Well, he wasn't wrong!
